snippet: Kansas and Arizona residents can continue to register to vote for now using a federal form without having to provide proof of citizenship, a federal appeals court ruled Thursday....

headline.print_headline: Court Issues Temporary Stay Over Voter Citizenship
headline.main: Court Issues Temporary Stay Over Voter Citizenship

lead_paragraph: Kansas and Arizona residents can continue to register to vote for now using a federal form without having to provide proof of citizenship, a federal appeals court ruled Thursday.
